#summary Release notes for 1.3.0

DKPro Core ASL 1.3.0 is a major release. It is not expected to be binary backwards compatible with previous versions. This page lists some of the more important changes and caveats regarding this version. For more detailed information on the changes in this version, please refer to the [http://code.google.com/p/dkpro-core-asl/issues/list?can=1&q=label:Milestone-1.3.0&sort=status&colspec=ID%20Type%20Status%20Priority%20Milestone%20Compatible%20Owner%20Summary issue tracker] or to the Subversion history.
